language.title: English (EN)
language.phrase: These are the default terms and conditions which, by default, a user will have to agree to when downloading a purchased product. You can show different terms per product when adding/editing a product. You may use BB code. You may use the {board_title} placeholder which will be replaced with your board title.
Specify the size (in pixels) of product thumbnails. Thumbnails will be cropped to a square.
Options for the XR Product Manager add-on
Add/change change log items to the above fields. New fields will be added automatically.
Agree to terms and conditions before download
If enabled, purchasers will be allowed to extend their support duration at any time. Additional time will be added to the end of their existing support duration.
Before you are able to download this product, you must activate the purchase by clicking here.
If enabled, the user will need to agree to the above terms and conditions (or the default terms) before downloading.
Coupon not a valid type for this purchase. Please try again.
Coupon ({coupon_code}) applies to extras and none are selected for this purchase. Please try again.
Coupon ({coupon_code}) does not apply to any of the selected extras for this purchase. Please try again.
Coupon ({coupon_code}) does not apply to any of the selected products for this purchase. Please try again.
If you wish to create a new user group specifically for this product, select "Create new group". It will be created with the name "@ Licensed customer: <Product name>".
If you wish to create a new user group specifically for this extra, select "Create new group". It will be created with the name "@ Extra reward: <Extra name>".
The currency used for the price given here will be inherited from the product/purchase it is applied to.
Owners of this optional extra will have this amount added on to their existing purchases when they renew.
I agree to and accept the terms and conditions for this product.
If you are creating this purchase for yourself, you may leave the username blank. The user cannot be edited once assigned to a user.
If you have recently paid for this purchase, thank you. Check back here later once the payment has been processed to view and download the product.
Indicates the type of purchase. Product purchases are new purchases, whereas extras and renewals are additional updates to existing purchases.
It is not possible to delete the last category.
You must provide a valid name and URL for this purchase and ensure it is kept up to date before downloading.
Describe the main features of your product in just a few words. New fields will be added as you type.
"Monetary discount" is based on the selected currency for the product being purchased.
Please enter a valid product tag line.
Please enter a valid product title.
No one has downloaded this version yet.
No products have been created yet.
Not a valid coupon code. Please try again.
Not a valid coupon code ({code}). Please try again.
Note: Both users (where valid) will be emailed regarding the transfer.
Please confirm which user you would like to transfer the following purchase from {name} to:
Please confirm you wish to buy the following product and customize any extras (if any) below
Please confirm you wish to renew the following purchase and extras (if any)
Please create at least one category before continuing.
Please enter a valid coupon code.
Please enter a valid coupon title.
Please enter a valid extra title.
Please select the optional extras you would like to buy for the following existing purchase:
If you select a forum above, a thread will be posted containing the update details.

Products which are no longer active can no longer be purchased, but they will remain visible in any user's existing purchases. It will not be possible for inactive products to be purchased, by extras for them or renew expired purchases.
Purchase cannot be activated as it is in an invalid state or does not require activation.
These values can be independently edited and the total values etc. are not calculated automatically.

{name},

Your purchase {purchase_key} for product {product_title} has expired.

You will be unable to download updates or receive support for the product until the purchase is renewed.
A purchase for {product_title} has been transferred to you.
Active purchases are downloadable and, if applicable, haven't yet expired.
Complete state applies to renewal and optional extra purchases where the payment has been completed successfully.
Expired purchases are still downloadable but can only be download up to the version that was available at the time it expired.
Inactive purchases need to be activated before downloading.
Pending purchases either haven't yet been paid for or the payment has not yet been processed.
Revoked licenses may have been revoked for a variety of reasons, usually because of a failed payment and may need to be re-purchased.

{name},

Your purchase {purchase_key} for product {product_title} has now been transferred.

You will no longer be able to access the purchase history, receive support, or download updates.

{name},

A purchase {purchase_key} for product {product_title} has now been transferred to you.

You should now be able to download updates, receive support and view the purchase details.
Purchasing this extra item will add an additional {extra_renew_price} charge on future renewals.
Puts the user in the selected groups while the support duration is active.
Receipt for your product purchase at {board_title}
Receipt for your purchase of optional extras at {board_title}
If selected, you will receive an email whenever a product you have purchased is updated.
Replacing the file here does not release an update or notify purchasers. Use the Release new version system for that purpose.
If a license requires activation before download then the purchaser will be required to provide their site name and URL before being able to download.
The selected coupon ({coupon_code}) has now expired.
The selected coupon ({coupon_code}) is no longer available.
By default, all valid purchasers of this product will receive an alert and an email notifying them of this update. You can opt out of the notifications for this update above.
The tag line should be a brief sentence about what this product is for.
Enter the terms and conditions relating to the purchase of this product.
Thank you for buying extras for this purchase. The purchase details will be updated once the payment is processed.
Thank you for making a purchase at {board_title}.
Thank you for renewing this purchase. The purchase details will be updated once the payment is processed.
There are newer (but unsupported) versions available for download in the list above.
There are no products matching your filters.
There are no valid versions available for this purchase.
This currency will be used for all price formatting and payments related to this product.
This is the cost for renewing a purchase after the initial support duration has expired (if one is defined below).
This is a generated key which uniquely identifies this purchase.
This key previously uniquely identified a specific cart. It will not appear on new purchases.
This product has expired. You may be missing out on the latest changes. You can renew the purchase by clicking here.
This purchase has been renewed recently. If you'd like to renew again so soon, additional time will be added onto the existing expiry date.
This purchase is already assigned to that user.
This was a renewal or extra purchase so the details of the purchase this updated are above.
If checked, the product's current version string will not be updated but this version will still be available to download.

{name},

Thank you for your purchase at {board_title}.

We are emailing to let you know that a new update has been released for {product_title}.
You can download more versions from the Your purchases page.
You can purchase extras at a later date if you do not wish to purchase them now.
You cannot use the same coupon more than once.
You do not have permission to use coupons.
You do not have permission to use the selected coupon ({coupon_code}).
You haven't made any valid purchases yet. If you made a purchase recently, it will appear here once the payment is processed.
You may use the {product} placeholder. This will be replaced with the product name (where applicable).
You must agree to the terms and conditions before downloading.
You must select at least one extra for an extra coupon.
You must select at least one product for a product coupon.
Are you sure you'd like to unsubscribe from all product updates?
Your purchase for {product_title} has been transferred.
Your purchase {purchase_key} for product {product_title} has expired. Renew now.
